title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-7.1 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-7.1 - General provisions

State Regulations

The following provisions of Subparts 145-1 and 145-2 of
this Part shall apply to the Liberty Scholarship Program: section
145-1.9
(leaves of absence); section
145-2.1
(full-time and part- time
study and remedial workload); section
145-2.2
(program pursuit and
academic progress); section
145-2.3
(approved programs); section
145-2.4
(matriculated status); section
145-2.5
(in- State study); section
145-2.6
(theological study); section
145-2.7
(five-year programs); section
145-2.8
(noninstructional external
degree programs); section
145-2.9
(accelerated study). All
provisions of Education Law, section 602 shall apply to the Liberty Scholarship

Program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
